name: TTT - Tidy Tied Tide
description:
Entry for the October T-Shirt Jam hosted by NOMNOM games

This game is a short interactive narrative experience. It is not intended to be replayed so, enjoy your first experience! Thanks for playing.

CONTROLS:

Mouse Left click: Select

Enter: toggle fullscreen

Esc: Exit

CREDITS:

Guillermo Vera Navarro

Iván Pérez Egea

Pedro Javier Nicolás Zamora

Daniel Navarro Hernández

Music by: Bensound
